solution_line_template: She needs a set of sheers that cost ${sheers_cost_per_pair} and a set of drapes that cost ${drapes_cost_per_pair} per window so that will cost her {sheers_cost_per_pair}+{drapes_cost_per_pair} = $<<{sheers_cost_per_pair}+{drapes_cost_per_pair}={cost_per_window}>>{cost_per_window}
She had {num_windows} windows she needs window treatments for they cost her ${cost_per_window} each so {num_windows}*{cost_per_window} = $<<{num_windows}*{cost_per_window}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
